name: Makeover Fever
description:
Welcome to the Free Fashion Tycoon Games! Different makeovers and fashion stories are drama every day！ Build your dream fashion shop and start a home design travel with Makeover Fever!



Time Management Games
Satisfy your customers within the limited patience time. Giving them an excellent shopping experience, make them have perfect fashion looks.



Home Design
Make the most use of your fashion taste and start a new decor life here! Redecor your fashion shopping shop as you want! Different types of shops are waiting for you to decorate!



Fashions Are All Over The World
Expand your fashion shopping shop to the world, bringing the most fashionable clothes to the world! Every place has different scene styles and levels, you will never feel boring.



Boosters & Upgrade
Using powerful boosters flexibly can greatly help you pass difficult levels. Every shop's equipment can be upgraded. Clear levels to earn gold coins and constantly transform your store!



Want to be a successful makeover fashion game Tycoon? In the fantasy fashion shopping shop scene, the most fashionable home design will make you feel the fashion mania and love the decor life!
From small shopping shops to luxury shops, open your fashion shopping shop worldwide and write your fashion legendary! Thousands of fashion customers dash into your fashion shopping shop and you need to manage your designer to serve them to have a perfect look.
The perfect combination of time-management games and house design games, let's enjoy Makeover Fever now!
